column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////me and my sis had lunch here today before heading to wrigley for the dodgers game.  the walls are lined with sports memoribilia.  pretty cool.  our waitress was also real nice and attentive.  prices are extremely affordable.  a pitcher of miller genuine draft
column3: cost 9 bucks.  sah-weeet.  the pizza was pretty tasty too.  nice buttery crust
column6: and tomato sauce.  not the best chicago pizza
column7: i've had.  that distinction ironically goes to zachary's in oakland
column8: no-cal.  but it's still some damn fine zah....
